text: @JoeBiden @realDonaldTrump Obama had a easy time with the Influenza because there were already established testing for Influenza.  But the RNA testing for Coronavirus should be properly done in a Biochemistry BSL3 or BSL4 LAB.  So this is not even a fair comparison.  #DemsAreDestroyingUSA
